entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for June 27, 2024

summary.caption: “Now just hold your horses, everyone. … Let’s let it run for a minute or so and see if it gets any colder.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for June 27, 2024

summary.caption: “Uh-oh, Lorraine ... someone seems to be checking you out.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for June 27, 2024

summary.caption: “Seems like Gramp’s been there forever—fossilized right there on his favorite rock. … Scares the hell out of the dog.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for June 27, 2024
The Far Side comic 5 for June 27, 2024

summary.caption: “Wait a minute! Say that again, Doris! … You know, the part about ‘If only we had some means of climbing down.’”
